about_the_game:
Season 9


The news arrived to "Fugo", who had been hiding for two months since he and Noel left.

It was the news of the "Noel broke through the checkpoint" and the "disappearance of the steel mill's members"!

As soon as he heard that, Fugo couldn't stay there and ran outside without any inhalation medicine, without regard for his weakened body.

However, Fugo is blocked by the "military power" of the “OCT”, which hold organizational power and immense violence.

A veteran soldier “Dratton” talks to Fugo, who is in desperate need of help.

"An organization with a stupid leader is no good. I'll tell you what 'power' is."

The elite group “OCT” and “The Bomber” - Witness what happens when these two sides clash!
detailed_description:
Season 9


The news arrived to "Fugo", who had been hiding for two months since he and Noel left.

It was the news of the "Noel broke through the checkpoint" and the "disappearance of the steel mill's members"!

As soon as he heard that, Fugo couldn't stay there and ran outside without any inhalation medicine, without regard for his weakened body.

However, Fugo is blocked by the "military power" of the “OCT”, which hold organizational power and immense violence.

A veteran soldier “Dratton” talks to Fugo, who is in desperate need of help.

"An organization with a stupid leader is no good. I'll tell you what 'power' is."

The elite group “OCT” and “The Bomber” - Witness what happens when these two sides clash!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: This is a story about the revenge of a girl who lost her arms and legs to a devil... Watch the secrets of LaPlace unravel as this all-new series starts!
